title: Flashmob Ogive
question_text:
Flash mobs are a fun internet phenomenon and pop songs are featured in many of them. The ogive below displays the number of practices that $25\text{ employees}$ in a small business attended before the debut of a recent flash mob.




Which of the following statements can be justified by the graph?

choices.text: In the beginning, very few people attended the recent flash mob practice, but as time passed, more and more employees attended.

72
%
of the employees attended
8
or more practices.
The association of the recent flash mob practices is positive and non-linear.

There is an outlier in this distribution. One of the employees attended
10
practices for the flash mob.
There is an outlier in this distribution. One of the employees attended two or fewer practices.
